s0152: Li Ji sent people placed poison in meat.
s0153: Resided two days, Xian Gong from hunt came returned, butcher presented meat to Xian Gong, Xian Gong wished eat it.
s0154: Li Ji from side stopped him, said: 'Meat from come far, should test it.'
s0157: gave small minister, small minister died.
s0158: Li Ji wept said: 'Crown prince why cruel!
s0159: His father wish assassinate replace him, moreover others?
s0160: Moreover lord old, morning evening person, once not able wait wish assassinate him!'
s0161: Told Xian Gong said: 'Crown prince so, not over concubine and Xi Qi reason.
s0162: Concubine wish mother son avoid other country, if early suicide, not make mother son become crown prince fish meat.
s0163: Initially lord wished abolish him, concubine still hated it;
s0164: to now, concubine especially self lost at this.'
s0165: Crown prince heard it, fled Xin Cheng.
s0166: Xian Gong angered, then executed his tutor Du Yuan Kuan.
s0167: Someone told crown prince said: 'Made this poison, Li Ji, crown prince why not self explain clarify it?'
s0168: Crown prince said: 'My lord old, without Li Ji, sleep not peaceful, eat not sweet.
s0169: If explain it, lord will anger her.
s0171: Someone told crown prince said: 'Can flee other country.'
s0172: Crown prince said: 'Bear this evil name exit, person who accept me?
s0174: Twelfth month Wu Shen, Shen Sheng suicide at Xin Cheng.
s0175: This time Chong Er, Yi Wu came court.
s0176: Person or informed Li Ji said: 'Two gong zi resent Li Ji slandered killed crown prince.'
s0177: Li Ji feared, because slandered two gong zi: 'Shen Sheng poison meat, two gong zi knew it.'
s0178: Two sons heard it, feared, Chong Er fled Pu, Yi Wu fled Qu, protected their cities, self prepared defense.
s0179: Initially, Xian Gong sent Shi Kui for two gong zi build Pu, Qu cities, not completed.
s0180: Yi Wu with informed Gong, Gong angered Shi Kui.
s0181: Shi Kui apologized said: 'Border cities few bandits, why use them?'
s0182: Retired sang said: 'Fox fur thick, one country three ministers, I who follow!'
s0184: And Shen Sheng died, two sons also returned protected their cities.
s0185: Twenty-second year, Xian Gong angered two sons not bid farewell left, indeed had plot, then sent troops attacked Pu.
s0186: Pu people's eunuch Bo Di commanded Chong Er quickly suicide.
s0187: Chong Er climbed wall, eunuch pursued cut his garment sleeve.
s0189: Sent people attack Qu, Qu city defended, not able descend.
s0190: This year, Jin again borrowed road at Yu to attack Guo.
s0191: Yu's grand master Gong Zhi Qi advised Yu lord said: 'Jin not able borrow road, this will extinguish Yu.'
s0192: Yu lord said: 'Jin my same surname, not suitable attack me.'
s0193: Gong Zhi Qi said: 'Tai Bo, Yu Zhong, Tai Wang sons, Tai Bo fled away, so not succeeded.
s0194: Guo Zhong, Guo Shu, Wang Ji sons, for Wen Wang ministers scholars, their merit records in wang chamber, stored in alliance repository.
s0195: Will Guo extinguished, what cherish Yu?
s0196: Moreover Yu close able closer than Huan, Zhuang clans?
s0197: Huan, Zhuang clans what crime, completely extinguished them.
s0198: Yu with Guo, lips with teeth, lips perished then teeth cold.'
s0199: Yu Gong not listened, then permitted Jin.
s0200: Gong Zhi Qi with his clan left Yu.
